channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-2370|2024-08-05T04:14:39.730Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20bi%20launchpad
item.description: Server Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in SAP Central Management Console, BI Launchpad and Fiori BI Launchpad, 4.10, from 4.20, from 4.30, could allow a malicious user to use common techniques to determine which ports are in use on the backend server.

item.title: CVE-2018-2382|2024-08-05T04:14:39.677Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server
item.description: A vulnerability in the SAP internet Graphics Server, 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, could allow a malicious user to store graphics in a controlled area and as such gain information from system area, which is not available to the user otherwise.

item.title: CVE-2018-2401|2024-08-05T04:21:32.880Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20business%20process%20automation%20%28bpa%29%20by%20redwood
item.description: SAP Business Process Automation (BPA) By Redwood does not sufficiently validate an XML document accepted from an untrusted source resulting in an XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2381|2024-08-05T04:14:39.759Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20erp%20financials%20information%20system
item.description: SAP ERP Financials Information System (SAP_APPL 6.00, 6.02, 6.03, 6.04, 6.05, 6.06, 6.16; SAP_FIN 6.17, 6.18, 7.00, 7.20, 7.30 S4CORE 1.00, 1.01, 1.02) does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-2399|2024-08-05T04:21:32.854Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20process%20monitoring%20infrastructure
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting in Process Monitoring Infrastructure, from 7.10 to 7.11, 7.20, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50, due to inefficient encoding of user controlled inputs.

item.title: CVE-2018-2393|2024-08-05T04:21:32.848Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server
item.description: Under certain conditions SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS) 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, fails to validate XML External Entity appropriately causing the SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS) to become unavailable.

item.title: CVE-2018-2422|2024-08-05T04:21:33.273Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server%20%28igs%29
item.description: SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS) Portwatcher, 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, allows an attacker to prevent legitimate users from accessing a service, either by crashing or flooding the service.

item.title: CVE-2018-2415|2024-08-05T04:21:33.263Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20application%20server%20%28engine%20api%29
item.description: SAP NetWeaver Application Server Java Web Container and HTTP Service (Engine API, from 7.10 to 7.11, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50; J2EE Engine Server Core 7.11, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50) do not sufficiently encode user controlled inputs, resulting in a content spoofing vulnerability when error pages are displayed.

item.title: CVE-2018-2385|2024-08-05T04:14:39.729Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server
item.description: Under certain conditions a malicious user provoking a divide by zero crash can prevent legitimate users from accessing the SAP Internet Graphics Server, 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, and its services.

item.title: CVE-2018-2410|2024-08-05T04:21:33.202Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20business%20one
item.description: SAP Business One, 9.2, 9.3, browser access does not sufficiently encode user controlled inputs, which results in a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2368|2024-08-05T04:14:39.708Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20system%20landscape%20directory%2C%20lm-core
item.description: SAP NetWeaver System Landscape Directory, LM-CORE 7.10, 7.20, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, does not perform any authentication checks for functionalities that require user identity.

item.title: CVE-2018-2423|2024-08-05T04:21:33.234Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server%20%28igs%29
item.description: SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS), 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, HTTP and RFC listener allows an attacker to prevent legitimate users from accessing a service, either by crashing or flooding the service.

item.title: CVE-2018-2388|2024-08-05T04:14:39.834Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server
item.description: Stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in SAP internet Graphics Server, 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53.

item.title: CVE-2018-2360|2024-08-05T04:14:39.585Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20startup%20service
item.description: SAP Startup Service, SAP KERNEL 7.45, 7.49, and 7.52, is missing an authentication check for functionalities that require user identity and cause consumption of file system storage.

item.title: CVE-2018-2402|2024-08-05T04:21:33.207Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana
item.description: In systems using the optional capture & replay functionality of SAP HANA, 1.00 and 2.00, (see SAP Note 2362820 for more information about capture & replay), user credentials may be stored in clear text in the indexserver trace files of the control system. An attacker with the required authorizations on the control system may be able to access the user credentials and gain unauthorized access to data in the captured or target system.

item.title: CVE-2018-2398|2024-08-05T04:21:32.877Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20business%20client
item.description: Under certain conditions SAP Business Client 6.5 allows an attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted.

item.title: CVE-2018-2364|2024-08-05T04:14:39.595Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20crm%20webclient%20ui
item.description: SAP CRM WebClient UI 7.01, 7.31, 7.46, 7.47, 7.48, 8.00, 8.01, S4FND 1.02, does not sufficiently validate and/or encode hidden fields, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2419|2024-08-05T04:21:33.627Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20enterprise%20financial%20services%20%28sapscore%29
item.description: SAP Enterprise Financial Services (SAPSCORE 1.11, 1.12; S4CORE 1.01, 1.02; EA-FINSERV 6.04, 6.05, 6.06, 6.16, 6.17, 6.18, 8.0) does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-2362|2024-08-05T04:14:39.598Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana
item.description: A remote unauthenticated attacker, SAP HANA 1.00 and 2.00, could send specially crafted SOAP requests to the SAP Startup Service and disclose information such as the platform's hostname.

item.title: CVE-2018-2424|2024-08-05T04:21:33.271Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20database
item.description: SAP UI5 did not validate user input before adding it to the DOM structure. This may lead to malicious user-provided JavaScript code being added to the DOM that could steal user information. Software components affected are: SAP Hana Database 1.00, 2.00; SAP UI5 1.00; SAP UI5 (Java) 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7,50; SAP UI 7.40, 7.50, 7.51, 7.52, and version 2.0 of SAP UI for SAP NetWeaver 7.00

item.title: CVE-2018-2394|2024-08-05T04:21:32.936Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server
item.description: Under certain conditions an unauthenticated malicious user can prevent legitimate users from accessing the SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS), 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, services and/or system files.

item.title: CVE-2018-2397|2024-08-05T04:21:32.881Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20business%20objects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: In SAP Business Objects Business Intelligence Platform, 4.00, 4.10, 4.20, 4.30, the Central Management Console (CMC) does not sufficiently encode user controlled inputs which results in Cross-Site Scripting.

item.title: CVE-2018-2377|2024-08-05T04:14:39.678Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: In SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0, some general server statistics and status information could be retrieved by unauthorized users.

item.title: CVE-2018-2371|2024-08-05T04:14:39.674Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20java%20web%20application
item.description: The SAML 2.0 service provider of SAP Netweaver AS Java Web Application, 7.50, does not sufficiently encode user controlled inputs, which results in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2409|2024-08-05T04:21:33.273Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20cloud%20platform%20connector
item.description: Improper session management when using SAP Cloud Platform 2.0 (Connectivity Service and Cloud Connector). Under certain conditions, data of some other user may be shown or modified when using an application built on top of SAP Cloud Platform.

item.title: CVE-2018-2392|2024-08-05T04:14:39.801Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server
item.description: Under certain conditions SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS) 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, fails to validate XML External Entity appropriately causing the SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS) to become unavailable.

item.title: CVE-2018-2405|2024-08-05T04:21:33.244Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20solution%20manager
item.description: SAP Solution Manager, 7.10, 7.20, Incident Management Work Center allows an attacker to upload a malicious script as an attachment and this could lead to possible Cross-Site Scripting.

item.title: CVE-2018-2408|2024-08-05T04:21:32.886Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20business%20objects
item.description: Improper Session Management in SAP Business Objects, 4.0, from 4.10, from 4.20, 4.30, CMC/BI Launchpad/Fiorified BI Launchpad. In case of password change for a user, all other active sessions created using older password continues to be active.

item.title: CVE-2018-2425|2024-08-05T04:21:34.073Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20business%20one
item.description: Under certain conditions, SAP Business One, 9.2, 9.3, for SAP HANA backup service allows an attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted.

item.title: CVE-2018-2366|2024-08-05T04:14:39.566Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20business%20process%20automation%20%28bpa%29%20by%20redwood
item.description: SAP Business Process Automation (BPA) By Redwood, 9.0, 9.1, allows an attacker to exploit insufficient validation of path information provided by users, thus characters representing 'traverse to parent directory' are passed through to the file APIs.

item.title: CVE-2018-2383|2024-08-05T04:14:39.695Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server
item.description: Reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability in SAP internet Graphics Server, 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53.

item.title: CVE-2018-2412|2024-08-05T04:21:32.877Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20disclosure%20management
item.description: SAP Disclosure Management 10.1 does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-2369|2024-08-05T04:14:39.744Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana
item.description: Under certain conditions SAP HANA, 1.00, 2.00, allows an unauthenticated attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted. An attacker can misuse the authentication function of the SAP HANA server on its SQL interface and disclose 8 bytes of the server process memory. The attacker cannot influence or predict the location of the leaked memory.

item.title: CVE-2018-2421|2024-08-05T04:21:33.262Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server%20%28igs%29
item.description: SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS) Portwatcher, 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, allows an attacker to prevent legitimate users from accessing a service, either by crashing or flooding the service.

item.title: CVE-2018-2499|2024-08-05T04:21:34.508Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20financial%20consolidation%20cube%20designer%20%28bobj_eades%29
item.description: A security weakness in SAP Financial Consolidation Cube Designer (BOBJ_EADES fixed in versions 8.0, 10.1) may allow an attacker to discover the password hash of an admin user.

item.title: CVE-2018-2389|2024-08-05T04:14:39.771Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server
item.description: Under certain conditions a malicious user can inject log files of SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS), 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, hiding important information in the log file.

item.title: CVE-2018-2384|2024-08-05T04:14:39.820Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server
item.description: Under certain conditions a malicious user provoking a Null Pointer dereference can prevent legitimate users from accessing the SAP Internet Graphics Server, 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, and its services.

item.title: CVE-2018-2387|2024-08-05T04:14:39.818Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server
item.description: A vulnerability in the SAP internet Graphics Server, 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, could allow a malicious user to obtain information on ports, which is not available to the user otherwise.

item.title: CVE-2018-2403|2024-08-05T04:21:33.236Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20disclosure%20management
item.description: Under certain conditions, SAP Disclosure Management 10.1 allows an attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted. It is possible for an authorized user to get SAP Disclosure Management to point a specific chapter type to a chapter the user has not been given access to.

item.title: CVE-2018-2386|2024-08-05T04:14:39.755Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server
item.description: Under certain conditions a malicious user provoking an out of bounds buffer overflow can prevent legitimate users from accessing the SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS), 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53.

item.title: CVE-2018-2428|2024-08-05T04:21:33.243Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20infrastructure
item.description: Under certain conditions SAP UI5 Handler allows an attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted. Software components affected are: SAP Infrastructure 1.0, SAP UI 7.4, 7.5, 7.51, 7.52 and version 2.0 of SAP UI for SAP NetWeaver 7.00.

item.title: CVE-2018-2484|2024-08-05T04:21:33.945Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20enterprise%20financial%20services%20%28sapscore%29
item.description: SAP Enterprise Financial Services (fixed in SAPSCORE 1.13, 1.14, 1.15; S4CORE 1.01, 1.02, 1.03; EA-FINSERV 1.10, 2.0, 5.0, 6.0, 6.03, 6.04, 6.05, 6.06, 6.16, 6.17, 6.18, 8.0; Bank/CFM 4.63_20) does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-2375|2024-08-05T04:14:39.702Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: In SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0, a controller user who has SpaceAuditor authorization in a specific space could retrieve application environments within that space.

item.title: CVE-2018-2376|2024-08-05T04:14:39.746Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: In SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0, a controller user who has SpaceAuditor authorization in a specific space could retrieve application environments within that space.

item.title: CVE-2018-2363|2024-08-05T04:14:39.709Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver
item.description: SAP NetWeaver, SAP BASIS from 7.00 to 7.02, from 7.10 to 7.11, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, from 7.50 to 7.52, contains code that allows you to execute arbitrary program code of the user's choice. A malicious user can therefore control the behaviour of the system or can potentially escalate privileges by executing malicious code without legitimate credentials.

item.title: CVE-2018-2372|2024-08-05T04:14:39.581Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: A plain keystore password is written to a system log file in SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0, which could endanger confidentiality of SSL communication.

item.title: CVE-2018-2406|2024-08-05T04:21:33.203Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20crystal%20reports%20server%2C%20oem%20edition
item.description: Unquoted windows search path (directory/path traversal) vulnerability in Crystal Reports Server, OEM Edition (CRSE), 4.0, 4.10, 4.20, 4.30, startup path.

item.title: CVE-2018-2404|2024-08-05T04:21:32.849Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20disclosure%20management
item.description: SAP Disclosure Management 10.1 allows an attacker to upload any file without proper file format validation.

item.title: CVE-2018-2420|2024-08-05T04:21:33.262Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server%20%28igs%29
item.description: SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS), 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, allows an attacker to upload any file (including script files) without proper file format validation.

item.title: CVE-2018-2373|2024-08-05T04:14:39.581Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: Under certain circumstances, a specific endpoint of the Controller's API could be misused by unauthenticated users to execute SQL statements that deliver information about system configuration in SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0.

item.title: CVE-2018-2380|2024-08-05T04:14:39.708Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20crm
item.description: SAP CRM, 7.01, 7.02,7.30, 7.31, 7.33, 7.54, allows an attacker to exploit insufficient validation of path information provided by users, thus characters representing "traverse to parent directory" are passed through to the file APIs.

item.title: CVE-2018-2418|2024-08-05T04:21:33.280Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20maxdb%20odbc%20driver
item.description: SAP MaxDB ODBC driver (all versions before 7.9.09.07) allows an attacker to inject code that can be executed by the application. An attacker could thereby control the behavior of the application.

item.title: CVE-2018-2367|2024-08-05T04:14:39.579Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20basis%20%28abap%20file%20interface%29
item.description: ABAP File Interface in, SAP BASIS, from 7.00 to 7.02, from 7.10 to 7.11, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, from 7.50 to 7.52, allows an attacker to exploit insufficient validation of path information provided by users, thus characters representing "traverse to parent directory" are passed through to the file APIs.

item.title: CVE-2018-2378|2024-08-05T04:14:39.625Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: In SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0, unauthorized users can read statistical data about deployed applications including resource consumption.

item.title: CVE-2018-2361|2024-08-05T04:14:39.619Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20solution%20manager
item.description: In SAP Solution Manager 7.20, the role SAP_BPO_CONFIG gives the Business Process Operations (BPO) configuration user more authorization than required for configuring the BPO tools.

item.title: CVE-2018-2417|2024-08-05T04:21:33.233Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20identity%20management
item.description: Under certain conditions, the SAP Identity Management 8.0 (pass of type ToASCII) allows an attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted.

item.title: CVE-2018-2413|2024-08-05T04:21:33.914Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20disclosure%20management
item.description: SAP Disclosure Management 10.1 does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-2395|2024-08-05T04:21:33.202Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server
item.description: Under certain conditions a malicious user may retrieve information on SAP Internet Graphic Server (IGS), 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, overwrite existing image or corrupt other type of files.

item.title: CVE-2018-2396|2024-08-05T04:21:32.937Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server
item.description: Under certain conditions a malicious user can prevent legitimate users from accessing the SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS), 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, using IGS Interpreter service.

item.title: CVE-2018-2374|2024-08-05T04:14:39.762Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: In SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0, a controller user who has SpaceAuditor authorization in a specific space could retrieve sensitive application data like service bindings within that space.

item.title: CVE-2018-2379|2024-08-05T04:14:39.757Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: In SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0, an unauthenticated user could test if a given username is valid by evaluating error messages of a specific endpoint.

item.title: CVE-2018-2365|2024-08-05T04:14:39.579Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20portal%20webdynpro%20runtime
item.description: SAP NetWeaver Portal, WebDynpro Java, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50, does not sufficiently encode user controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
